TopicTitle: how to move my joystick settings?

Articles.Content:
Is there a file I can copy from one copy of KSP to another to move the joystick configuration?

(BTW: from version 0.25 to the current build)

That would be the Settings.cfg, though it may be incompatible.

Also, moving to Support...
thanks, I looked for the support forum- (didn't scroll down far enough!)
